name: AI Translation Smart Glasses with Chat GPT for Men and Women - Real-time Translator 164 Languages, Music Playback & Hands-Free Calls for Daily Use, Travel
short_description: 【Smart Translation Glasses for 164 Languages】:These Smart Bluetooth glasses offer real-time translation for 164 languages, it covers 98% of common global languages like English, Chinese, Spanish, and French. Being ideal for travelers, business folks, and language learners worldwide, it effortlessly breaks down language barriers

【Multiple Translation Function Modes, No Subscription Needed】: Our translation glasses shatter the "paid subscription" constraint of rival products. Just download the "Ear Dance" APP and bind the device, and you can use it permanently without subscribing. Support Function: face-to-face, Voice Notes, Audio and videotranslation, Photo translation, Simultaneous Interpretation, etc. **Additionally, the Ear Dance APP cannot perform offline translations; translations must be done within the app itself.

Audio & Video Call Translation: Our translator glasses feature video call and voice call translation technology, can help you achieve: For example, in the United States, you can communicate with international friends on the other side of the globe through video and phone translation features, completely eliminating language barriers.

AI Chat Mode: Our real-time translation glasses feature cutting-edge AI technologies—ChatGPT+Deepseek-R1+Gemini-2.5-Pro—delivering a seamless and intelligent conversational experience. Whether for casual chats, information lookups, writing assistance, brainstorming, or academic research, the AI provides detailed responses—perfectly suited for in-depth discussions.

【Physically-Changing Lenses】These 2-in-1 transparent Bluetooth glasses are equipped with physically-changing lenses that slowly transform into sunglasses outdoors and revert to transparent lenses indoors, providing optimal vision and eye protection in any environment. **All frame can be fitted with Rx lenses**

【Music & Call Glasses】Our AI smart glasses feature 3D surround sound, delivering immersive audio directly to your ears—no headphones needed. With touch control buttons, you can answer calls/ hang up, activate voice assistant, switch music, etc., effortlessly making daily tasks more convenient and efficient

NOTE: This pair of smart glasses does not come with a camera. After receiving the product, please turn on the smart glasses by pressing the power buttons on both sides of the temples. Wait for the temples to automatically pair, which takes approximately 5 seconds, before connecting to your phone via Bluetooth.
